text: The 2011 Islands District Council election was held on 6 November 2011 to elect all 10 elected members to the 21-member District Council. ==Overall election results== Before election: {| style="width:50%; text-align:center;" |+ ↓ |- style="color:white;" | style="background:green; width:20%;" | 2 | style="background:red; width:80%;" | 8 |- | PD | Pro-Beijing |} Change in composition: {| style="width:50%; text-align:center;" |+ ↓ |- style="color:white;" | style="background:green; width:10%;" | 1 | style="background:red; width:90%;" | 9 |- | PD | Pro-Beijing |} ==References== ==External links== * Election Results - Overall Results Category:2011 Hong Kong local elections
title: 2011 Islands District Council election
